<hr>

My office is located in 228 Walker Hall. Students may schedule an appointment online using [book now](https://thomleyje.youcanbook.me/). Drop-ins during office hours are welcomed and encouraged, but appointments will take precedence. Students enrolled in my classes should use their private forums on AsULearn to contact me electronically when needed.
